desctiption.p: Ms. Jessica Zhang is the founding president of Langda Consulting Inc., a Toronto-based company providing capital market advisory, business consulting and facilitation services to Chinese companies and investors wishing to invest in Canada. The same services are used by Canadian companies seeking investment opportunities in China. Ms. Zhang is a seasoned investment professional with over 12 years experience in equity and investment research, portfolio management, corporate finance and international business development.

Born in China where she completed her undergraduate education and worked as a journalist, Ms. Zhang moved to Canada in 1998 and obtained her MBA degree at the University of Alberta, in 2001. Ms. Zhang has been a Chartered Financial Analyst (CFA) since 2004.
